About Me

ABOUT ME

Hello!, My name is Aferil Yudhatama. I was born in Jakarta, April 10, 2003. I am currently a student at Budi Luhur University. I have internship experience while still in Vocational High School, namely as a software developer at the National Narcotics Agency, and PT. Citra Corpora Center Park.

Now, I'm looking for opportunities to gain work experience and broaden my skills. The skills I have are, HTML, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, and Tailwind CSS.
